Package com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.eclipse

Eclipse specific implementations forming an IDE plugin.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Activator The activator is created when the plugin is first initialized; it is the equivalent of the main method in a standard application.
BindingsEditorAction The action to take when the user selects some text and chooses "Find Bindings" from the right click menu.
BindingsObjectAction The action to take when the user selects an object in the tree view (Outline) and selects "Find Bindings" from the right click menu.
EclipseErrorView Displays error output from the Guice plugin that is logged to the Messenger.
EclipseGuicePlugin Eclipse implementation of the GuicePlugin.
EclipseGuicePlugin.ModuleSelectionViewImpl  
EclipseGuicePlugin.ResultsViewImpl  
EclipseResultsView The Eclipse implementation of the ResultsView, a view for displaying results and error messages (a view is a tab in the lower panel).
GuicePluginConfigureAction Responds to the user choosing configure from the Guice menu by opening the configure dialog.
RunModulesAutoAction Menu action to run modules automatically or not.
RunModulesNowAction Menu action to run the modules now.
 

Package com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.eclipse Description

Eclipse specific implementations forming an IDE plugin.

The Eclipse classes consist of actions to be run in response to the user selecting menu items and of views and dialogs displaying results and configuration options.

The EclipseGuicePlugin is a concrete implementation of a GuicePlugin that is the core object of the IDE plugin. The EclipsePluginModule (and its inner submodule the EclipsePluginModule$EclipseGuiceToolsModule) are concrete implementations of the GuicePluginModule and GuiceToolsModule that bind the Eclipse pieces.
